GoalDesc: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
TargetDesc: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
IndicatorDesc: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
SeriesDesc: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies (%)
Source: Sendai Framework Monitoring System as provided by designated national focal points (2018)
Footnotes: Some of the data has not followed an official validation process and may be subject to revision at a later date.”
